title: DEEP TRANCE STATE: END OF А TRANCE / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
One of Dr. Marco Paret's students from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass was strongly hypnotized during their exercises. In this video we can see his powerful reaction as he wakes up from the deep trance. His eyes are rolling up and he shares that he feels weight coming out. After this powerful hypnotic experience, the subject felt transformed, happier and liberated. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info
